info.description: This is an API for accessing all sorts of college football data.  Please note that API keys should be supplied with "Bearer " prepended (e.g. "Bearer your_key"). API keys can be acquired from the CollegeFootballData.com website.
info.title: College Football Data API

tags.description: Data relating to Predicted Points and other metrics
tags.name: metrics

get.description: Get calendar of weeks by season

parameters.description: id filter for querying a single game
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: Season type filter (regular, postseason, or both)
parameters.name: seasonType

parameters.description: Media type filter (tv, radio, web, ppv, or mobile)
parameters.name: mediaType

get.description: Player stats broken down by game
Team stats broken down by game
Weather information for the hour of kickoff

parameters.description: Game id filter (required if no year)
parameters.name: gameId

parameters.description: Year filter (required if no game id)
parameters.name: year

parameters.description: Season type filter (regular, postseason, or both)
parameters.name: seasonType

get.description: Gets player stats associated by play (limit 1000)

parameters.description: Filter to remove garbage time plays from calculations
parameters.name: excludeGarbageTime

get.summary: Player usage metrics broken down by season

parameters.description: Week filter (required if team, offense, or defense, not specified)
parameters.name: week

parameters.description: Filter to remove garbage time plays from calculations
parameters.name: excludeGarbageTime

get.summary: Team Predicated Points Added (PPA/EPA) by game

get.description: Predicted Points Added (PPA) by player game

parameters.description: Filter to remove garbage time plays from calculations
parameters.name: excludeGarbageTime

get.summary: Player Predicated Points Added (PPA/EPA) broken down by game

get.description: Predicted Points Added (PPA) by player season

parameters.description: Filter to remove garbage time plays from calculations
parameters.name: excludeGarbageTime

get.summary: Player Predicated Points Added (PPA/EPA) broken down by season
Predicted Points (i.e. Expected Points or EP)

parameters.description: Year filter (required if team not specified)
parameters.name: year

parameters.description: Team filter (required if year not specified)
parameters.name: team

parameters.description: Filter to remove garbage time plays from calculations
parameters.name: excludeGarbageTime

get.summary: Predicted Points Added (PPA/EPA) data by team

parameters.description: Season filter (required if team not specified)
parameters.name: year

parameters.description: Team filter (required if year not specified)
parameters.name: team

get.description: Get average SP+ historical rating data by conference
SRS rating data (requires either a year or team specified)

parameters.description: Season filter (required if team not specified)
parameters.name: year

parameters.description: Team filter (required if year not specified)
parameters.name: team

get.description: Gets a list of aggregated statistics by team and position grouping
Get player recruiting rankings and data. Requires either a year or team to be specified.

parameters.description: Recruiting class year (required if team no specified)
parameters.name: year

parameters.description: Committed team filter (required if year not specified)
parameters.name: team

parameters.description: Classification filter (fbs, fcs, ii, or iii). Defaults to fbs.
parameters.name: classification

parameters.description: Year filter (required if no team specified)
parameters.name: year

parameters.description: Team filter (required if no year specified)
parameters.name: team

parameters.description: Filter to remove garbage time plays from calculations
parameters.name: excludeGarbageTime

parameters.description: Season type filter (regular, postseason, or both)
parameters.name: seasonType

parameters.name: seasonType
